QuestData.Title: From the Belly of the Beast
QuestData.Description: I think we can rebuild him. Perhaps if we put him back together he can give us information about Crowley.$B$BWe must kill every crocolisk in this marsh until we find the rest of Sean Dempsey's body! From the belly of the beast this man will be reborn!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Dempsey's Torso, Dempsey's Appendages and Dempsey's Giblets.
QuestData.CompletionText: At the very least we'll have some crocolisk hides to make fancy shoes out of.
QuestData.RewardText: Now let's see if I can do this.$B$B<Godfrey starts mumbling under his breath.>$B$B...leg bone connects to the thigh bone...$B$B...arm bone to torso...$B$B...sprinkle on a little Forsaken necromancy...$B$BTA-DA!
